name: Invite not registered user to organization with default project via UI
description:
- Login with valid credentials.
- Create new organization.
- Create project with `default` option.
- Invite **not registered** user to organization.

### Verify that:

- Newly invited user automatically is member of default project.
descriptionHtml:
• Login with valid credentials.
  • Create new organization.
  • Create project with default option.
  • Invite not registered user to organization.

Verify that:

  • Newly invited user automatically is member of default project.

testStage.description:
- Login with valid credentials.
- Create new organization.
- Create project with `default` option.
- Invite **not registered** user to organization.

### Verify that:

- Newly invited user automatically is member of default project.
